title: S. Privacy Policy Changes
content: We reserve the right to modify, update, amend or cancel this Privacy Policy at any time, in accordance with applicable data privacy laws.
Any changes to the policy will be posted on this page, so we encourage you to review it regularly.
Please refer to the "Effective Date" as set forth above to determine when the latest updates were made.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding these changes, please contact us at
